price: ដូចេ្នះ តើអ្នកដែលមានជំនឿដូចអ្នកដែលល្មើសនឹងបទ បញ្ជារបស់អល់ឡោះដែរឬ? ពួកគេមិនដូចគ្នាឡើយ។
arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤۡمِنٗا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقٗاۚ لَّا يَسۡتَوُۥنَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: afaman kāna mu'minan kaman kāna fāsiqan lā yastawūna
